effect.x-y: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used water pledge earlier this turn, moves used by any friendly Pokémon have doubled effect chance for four turns (including this one).

short_effect.x-y: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon’s moves for four turns.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: With Water Pledge, doubles the effect chance of friendly Pokémon’s moves for four turns.

flavor_text.x-y: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass equivalent, its damage increases and a vast sea of fire appears.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: A column of fire hits the target. When used with its grass equivalent, its damage increases and a vast sea of fire appears.
